column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Suyin says : " Thanks for coming to save us , Mom . "
#Text=Lin says : " Yeah , thanks , Chief .
#Text=Good enough to risk my bony old butt for , anyway .
#Text=If you can just find some way not to hate me , maybe that 's enough , at least for me .
#Text=" Lin says : " Me too .
#Text=" Bolin says : " You know , I never had any family except for my brother until a few years ago , and reuniting with them made me realize how special it is .
#Text=" Toph says : " Argh , enough !
#Text=Enjoy the ride back to the city with the gum flapper here .
#Text=" Opal says : " Are n't you coming back to Republic City with us , Grandma ?
#Text=" Toph says : " No , my fighting days are over .
#Text=Do n't tell Korra , but my back is killing me now .
#Text=This is why you did n't see Katara messing with that civil war nonsense .
#Text=At some point , you got ta leave it to the kids .
#Text=" Zhu Li says : " I want to thank you for coming back to save me .
#Text=And do n't be too hard on Bolin for working with Kuvira .
#Text=His heart was in the right place .
#Text=" Opal says : " I think Bolin has worked his way out of the polar bear doghouse .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Yes !
#Text=" Zhu Li says : " We should get going .
#Text=I 'm afraid I have bad news to deliver to Republic City .
#Text=Kuvira is going to attack in two weeks .
#Text="
